DOC.brief_summary: Green tea consists of several components, with most research focusing on the polyphenol fraction. The polyphenol fraction(-)-epigallocatechin-3-gallate (EGCG)has been studied extensively as an anti-inflammatory agent as well as a preventative agent for cancer. It has been shown to effectively reduce the inflammation associated with animal models of inflammatory bowel disease. This clinical trial will determine the ability of EGCG, in the form of Polyphenon E®, to treat patients with mild to moderately severe ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of Green Tea Extract (Polyphenon E®)in Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Adult male or female with mildly to moderately active ulcerative colitis Off prohibited medications for proscribed period of time Evidence of infectious colitis Labs outside of range Pregnancy or lactation
